about_the_game:
Prepare for an endless onslaught of the undead in Mortalis Meltdown, a heart-pounding, action-packed top-down zombie shooter!

Embrace the thrill of survival as you face wave after wave of relentless zombies, their numbers growing ever larger and their hunger for flesh never-ending.

Mortalis Meltdown is the ultimate test of your zombie-slaying prowess. Can you survive the endless onslaught and emerge as the ultimate undead hunter?

Features
  • Endless waves of zombies that you need to outmaneuver
  • Gain points for kills, compete against a leaderboard
  • Multiple weapons that are upgradable
  • Collect health packs to stay alive
  • Difficulty increases as the game progresses
  • Purchase additional characters to play as

Mortalis Meltdown is a work in progress. We are launching promptly, but first, we will conduct a private beta test, do a demo giveaway, followed by a public playtest before the game is ready for the masses. After the release, we will develop a multiplayer mode with a ton of different weapons and characters to choose from.
